name: cchip
0:
”Alexa, turn on living room light”
”Alexa, turn off living room light”
”Alexa, set living room light to 20%”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Use this skill to control the equipment in your home, and you can also set the brightness. For example, Turn on/off living room light. can open or close the light. Say Set living room light to 20%, so you can set the light brightness to 20%.
Support instruction：
 1.Alexa, turn on living room light
 2.Alexa, turn off living room light
 3.Alexa, set living room light to 20%
 4.Alexa, brighten living room light
 5.Alexa, dim living room light
 6.Alexa, set living room light to red
 7.Alexa, make the living room light warmer
 8.Alexa, make the living room light cooler
 9.Alexa, set living room light cool
 

 To use this skill, you need to have an intelligent lamp, and you need an xinzhongxin account . Then you link your account to Amazon account, then Discover my devices. to your speaker, then you can control your device.
